readable.content: The three people are wearing black blindfolds . Three blindfolded people are in front of a white ' Salvar o Planeta ' wall . Three people in blindfolds stand under a sign written in Spanish . Three people wearing black blindfolds near a " Salvar O Planeta " sign . Three people wearing blindfolds with a Greenpeace sign hanging in the background .
